attributes.action: Request that the Queen dissolves parliment and allows the people to choose a new government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a member of the general public I request that you allow us to pick a government and give them a mandate that we have chosen. At the moment we have a prime minister leading a cabinet that has no mandate from the public and they are bringing the country to its knees. We the people need to be allowed to chose who we want to lead us out of this mess

rejection.details: There is already a petition calling for a general election which you may want to sign: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/GoToCountryNow/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
